搘搘搘
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

搘字的基本解释

搘
zhī
古同“支”，支撑。

搘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhī］
［《字彙》旨而切］
支撑；支持。

搘字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搘； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页447第02
【正韻】旨而切，音支。搘捂也。【唐書·南詔傳】初鳳迦異築柘東城，諸葛亮石刻故在，文曰：?卽仆，常以石搘捂。亦作枝。又作支。別从木作榰。

搘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
搘字的起名意思

暂无。

prop
Basic explanation of words
prop
zhī
Ancient Tong "supports" and supports.
prop
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhī］
["The Words of the Word" is cut by purpose]
Support; support.
prop
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　搘; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 447 02
[Zheng Yun] The purpose is cut, and the sound is supported. Pian cover also. [Tang Shu·Nanzhao Biography] Chu Feng Jiayi built Zhedong City. Zhuge Liang's stone inscriptions were there, and the text said: "The servant servant, often covered with stone. Also make branches. Make another support. Don't make it from wood.
